publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6835Jackie Baillie:McDonald’s Football Open Day—That the Parliament notes that the local McDonald’s franchise in Dumbarton will be hosting a Football Open Day in the area on 21 August 2010 in association with Renton Craigandro FC, Argyle Athletic FC and Dumbarton United AFC; further notes that the open day will include coaching sessions, a mini tournament and an autograph signing session with Scotland legend Kenny Dalglish; understands that since 2002 McDonald’s has contributed over £21 million towards encouraging active lifestyles through its coaching programmes and sponsoring 4,500 clubs across the UK, and hopes that all participants thoroughly enjoy their experience. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Helen Eadie*, James Kelly*, Ken Macintosh*, Gil Paterson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, David Stewart*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6835 McDonald’s Football Open Day (lodged on 19 August 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, Stuart McMillan*, Karen Whitefield*
